title: Denys Shmyhal - Wikipedia
snippet: As Prime Minister, Shmyhal was in charge of handling the response to the COVID-19 pandemic in Ukraine and conducting the defense of Ukraine during the 2022 Russian invasion. On 15 July 2025, Shmyhal submitted his resignation, a day after President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced a government ...

title: Ukraine’s Prime Minister Shmyhal Resigns After 5 Years
snippet: On Tuesday, July 15, Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal announced his resignation after five years in office.

title: Ukraine's parliament dismisses prime minister and his cabinet
snippet: The Ukrainian parliament on Juĺy 16 voted to accept Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal's resignation, thus dismissing his government and starting a cabinet reshuffle.

title: Ukrainian PM Denys Shmyhal resigns day after Zelenskyy nominates his deputy for post - India Today
snippet: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal said on Tuesday that he had submitted his resignation letter, marking the beginning of a major governmental reshuffle expected later this week.

title: Ukraine's prime minister submits resignation, parliament set to dismiss government on July 16
snippet: The parliament is set to dismiss the government on July 16 as Prime Minister Denys Shymhal submitted his resignation.
